```{r}

library(cricketdata)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggtext)
player_id<-find_player_id(params$player)$ID
df<-fetch_player_data(player_id, "Test") %>%
  mutate(NotOut = (Dismissal == "not out"))

```

 Performance of `r params$player` is shown below 


```{r}
#| echo: false
#| warning: false
#| message: false
df<-fetch_player_data(player_id, "Test") %>%
  mutate(NotOut = (Dismissal == "not out")) |> filter(Date>"2018-07-01")

AAave <- df %>%
  filter(!is.na(Runs)) %>%
  summarise(Average = sum(Runs) / (n() - sum(NotOut))) %>%
  pull(Average)

AAave <- df %>%
  filter(!is.na(Runs)) %>%
  summarise(Average = sum(Runs) / (n() - sum(NotOut))) %>%
pull(Average)


names(AAave) <- paste("Average =", round(AAave, 2))

# Plot Test scores
ggplot(df) +
  geom_hline(aes(yintercept = AAave), col="gray")+ 
  geom_point(aes(x = Date, y = Runs, col = NotOut,size=2)) +
  scale_y_continuous(sec.axis = sec_axis(~., breaks = AAave))+theme(legend.position = "none") 
```
